question.title: Configure IntelliJ to generate Java 25+ code using IO rather than System.out/System.in
question.body:
Java 25 gained the convenience class IO for simpler access to the console, with print, println, & readln methods. See JEP 512: Compact Source Files and Instance Main Methods for details.

In my Java 25 projects, IntelliJ IDEA 2025.3 EAP continues suggesting & generating code using System.out/System.in rather than IO.

Is there some way to get IntelliJ to use IO?

I know IntelliJ provides a Live Template iop for println() and ior for readln(), expanding them into the IO methods. See the company blog post. My question refers to code suggested or generated by the IDE.
